events.name: QualityControlReportCreated
events.description: Represents the creation of a quality control report after inspection of products.

events.name: QualityControlReportReviewed
events.description: Evaluates the quality control report for compliance.

events.name: QualityControlReportApproved
events.description: Indicates that a quality control report has been approved.

events.name: QualityControlReportRejected
events.description: Signifies that the quality control report did not meet standards.

commands.name: CreateQualityControlReport
commands.description: Represents the creation of a quality control report after inspection of products.

commands.name: ReviewQualityControlReport
commands.description: Evaluates the quality control report for compliance.

commands.name: ApproveQualityControlReport
commands.description: Indicates that a quality control report has been approved.

commands.name: RejectQualityControlReport
commands.description: Signifies that the quality control report did not meet standards.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Inventory Management to reflect changes after quality control assessments.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Supplier Management to report quality issues back to suppliers.

integrationPoints.name: SalesManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Sales Management for products on hold due to quality issues.
